title: The Brookings Institution holds a discussion on "In the Shadow of Impeachment Hearings, Dueling Visions for the Nation," focusing on the findings of the 10th American Values Survey.
body:
TIME: 10 a.m. 

PARTICIPANTS: Robert Jones, CEO of the Public Religion Research Institute; Jennifer Rubin, opinion writer at the 
Washington Post; Joy Reid, host of MsNBC's "AM Joy"; William Galston, senior fellow in governance studies at 
Brookings; and E.J. Dionne Jr., senior fellow in governance studies at Brookings 

LOCATION: Brookings Institution, 1775 Massachusetts Avenue NW, Falk Auditorium, Washington, D.C. 

CONTACT: 202-797-6105, events@brookings.edu; http://www.brookings.edu
